Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl

Class ExpenseService

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl.ExpenseService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpenseService
@Service public class ExpenseService extends Object implements IExpenseService
Service class for managing expenses.

    • postExpense

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DtoResponseExpense> postExpense(DtoRequestExpense request, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, Integer userId)
      Creates a new expense based on the provided request and file.
      Specified by:
      postExpense in interface IExpenseService
      Parameters:
      request - The DTO containing expense details.
      file - The file associated with the expense (can be null).
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created expense details.
      Throws:
      CustomException - if the expense is not valid or already exists.

    • getExpenseByPaymentDateRange

      public List<ExpenseModel> getExpenseByPaymentDateRange(LocalDate from, LocalDate to)
      Retrieves a list of expenses within a specified payment date range.
      Specified by:
      getExpenseByPaymentDateRange in interface IExpenseService
      Parameters:
      from - The start date of the payment date range (inclusive).
      to - The end date of the payment date range (inclusive).
      Returns:
      A list of ExpenseModel objects representing the expenses within the specified date range.

    • putExpense

      public DtoResponseExpense putExpense(DtoRequestExpense request, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, Integer userId)
      Updates an existing expense based on the provided request and file.
      Specified by:
      putExpense in interface IExpenseService
      Parameters:
      request - The DTO containing the updated expense details.
      file - The file associated with the expense (can be null).
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      A DtoResponseExpense object containing the updated expense details.
      Throws:
      CustomException - if the expense is not valid or does not exist.

    • updateExpenseEntity

      public void updateExpenseEntity(ExpenseEntity existingExpense, ExpenseModel expenseModel, List<ExpenseDistributionModel> newDistributions, Integer userId)
      Updates an existing expense entity.
      Parameters:
      existingExpense - The existing expense entity to be updated.
      expenseModel - The expense model containing the updated data.
      userId - The User ID
      newDistributions - The list of new expense distribution models.

    • getExpenseById

      public DtoExpenseQuery getExpenseById(Integer expenseId)
      Retrieves an expense by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getExpenseById in interface IExpenseService
      Parameters:
      expenseId - the ID of the expense to retrieve
      Returns:
      a DtoExpenseQuery object containing the details of the expense
      Throws:
      CustomException - if the expense does not exist or is not enabled

    • getExpenses

      public List<DtoExpenseQuery> getExpenses(String expenseType, String category, String provider, String dateFrom, String dateTo)
      Retrieves a list of expenses filtered by the given parameters.
      Specified by:
      getExpenses in interface IExpenseService
      Parameters:
      expenseType - the type of expense to filter by (optional)
      category - the category of the expense to filter by (optional)
      provider - the provider of the expense to filter by (optional)
      dateFrom - the start date for filtering
      dateTo - the end date for filtering expenses (required, format: YYYY-MM-DD)
      Returns:
      a list of DtoExpenseQuery objects that match the filters
      Throws:
      CustomException - if the date range is invalid

    • mapEntityToDtoExpense

      public DtoExpenseQuery mapEntityToDtoExpense(ExpenseEntity expenseEntity, Map<Integer,String> providerMap, List<OwnerDto> owners)
      Maps an `ExpenseEntity` to a `DtoExpenseQuery`.
      Parameters:
      expenseEntity - The expense entity to map.
      providerMap - A map of provider IDs to provider descriptions.
      owners - A list of `OwnerDto` objects representing the owners.
      Returns:
      A `DtoExpenseQuery` object containing the mapped expense details.

    • mapModelToDtoExpense

      public DtoExpenseQuery mapModelToDtoExpense(ExpenseModel expenseModel, List<OwnerDto> ownerDtos, Map<Integer,String> providerMap)
      Maps an ExpenseModel to a DtoExpenseQuery.
      Parameters:
      expenseModel - The expense model to map.
      ownerDtos - list of owner DTOs to use for mapping distributions.
      providerMap - A map of provider IDs to provider descriptions.
      Returns:
      A DtoExpenseQuery object containing the mapped data.

    • deteleExpense

      public DtoResponseDeleteExpense deteleExpense(Integer id, Integer userId)
      Deletes an expense logically by setting its enabled status to false.
      Specified by:
      deteleExpense in interface IExpenseService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the expense to be deleted.
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      A DtoResponseDeleteExpense object containing the deletion result.
      Throws:
      CustomException - if the expense does not exist or has related bill installments.

    • createCreditNoteForExpense

      public DtoResponseExpense createCreditNoteForExpense(Integer id, Integer userId)
      Creates a credit note for an existing expense.
      Specified by:
      createCreditNoteForExpense in interface IExpenseService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the expense for which to create a credit note.
      userId - The User ID
      Returns:
      A DtoResponseExpense object containing the created credit note details.
      Throws:
      CustomException - if the expense already has a credit note or other validation errors occur.
